sense.def:
The morning
je del dneva med časom, ko se ljudje zbudijo, in kosilom.

seg.quote: She left after breakfast on Saturday morning.
I was reading the morning paper.

sense.def:
Tudi del dneva med polnočjo in poldnevom se imenuje
the morning
.

seg.quote: She died in the very early hours of this morning.
It was five o'clock in the morning.
